remarks: Lemma for ~ meetval2 and ~ meeteu .  (Contributed by NM, 12-Sep-2018.) TODO: combine this through meeteu into meetlem?
statement:
meetval2.b $e |- B = ( Base ` K ) $.
meetval2.l $e |- .<_ = ( le ` K ) $.
meetval2.m $e |- ./\ = ( meet ` K ) $.
meetval2.k $e |- ( ph -> K e. V ) $.
meetval2.x $e |- ( ph -> X e. B ) $.
meetval2.y $e |- ( ph -> Y e. B ) $.
meetval2lem $p |- ( ( X e. B /\ Y e. B ) -> ( ( A. y e. { X , Y } x .<_ y /\ A. z e. B ( A. y e. { X , Y } z .<_ y -> z .<_ x ) ) <-> ( ( x .<_ X /\ x .<_ Y ) /\ A. z e. B ( ( z .<_ X /\ z .<_ Y ) -> z .<_ x ) ) ) ) $.
$d ./\ x z $.
$d .<_ y $.
$d B x z $.
$d K x y z $.
$d X x y z $.
$d Y x y z $.
